chart_description: The `redis.net` chart displays the bandwidth usage of the Redis server. It measures the amount of data sent and received over the network for Redis operations.

dimension_descriptions.received: The amount of data received by the Redis server over the network. This includes data from client requests, as well as replication traffic from other Redis instances.
dimension_descriptions.sent: The amount of data sent by the Redis server over the network. This includes responses to client requests, as well as replication traffic to other Redis instances.
